div.h2: At Southern Tioga, our guiding principles…

i.class: fa icon fa-institution reverse round big color2

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 10pt; line-height: 16.866666793823242px; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Cambria, serif;
p.span: A structure, a philosophy; a framework that empowers learners to have a major voice in their learning.

i.class: fa icon fa-battery reverse round big color2

p.span: All stakeholders have a voice that shall include choice, feedback, opportunities for collaboration and access to information, ultimately resulting in informed contributions to our global society.﻿

i.class: fa icon fa-group reverse round big color2

div.p: All learners will be provided opportunities for success, self-expression, curiosity and positive risk-taking.

i.class: fa icon fa-trophy reverse round big color2

div.p: Encouraging students, family, community and schools to pose questions, problem-solve, seek creative solutions and contribute to the growth of learners.﻿

i.class: fa icon fa-comments reverse round big color2

p.span: A belief that learning is a relationship between students, families, schools, community and the global society.

i.class: fa icon fa-mortar-board reverse round big color2

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 10pt; line-height: 16.866666793823242px; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Cambria, serif;
p.span: The philosophy that learning has no end, is boundless; infinite.

div.p: See our latest updates from social media below
Please feel free to use the form below to contact our district.

p.a: Southern Tioga School District is offering a list of resources and information related to the Coronavirus outbreak. Click Here for details

p.span: The Southern Tioga Remote Learning Page is a part of our Continuity of Education Plan and created to assist students in learning beyond the classroom. The Remote Learning Page consists of two phases; Enrichment and Review and Planned Instruction.

- A collection of resources, developed activities and learning opportunities for students to utilize while away from our buildings. STSD faculty and staff will update this list of sites regularly and we encourage our students to check-back often.
p.b: These activities will not be assessed or graded.

p.span: - A learning opportunity that allows for students to complete the fourth marking period with a final project, called a Capstone Project. The focus of this project is on learning. Student participation and attendance will be tracked on a weekly basis and upon completion of the Capstone Project.
p.b: These activities will be graded on a Pass/No Credit basis.

p.span: While these learning opportunities, and our continuity of education plan cannot fully replace the face-to-face learning that happens between teachers and students, we believe these resources will provide a valuable support to students and families during this time of remote learning.

a.strong: Click Here to go to our Remote Learning Page
